actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain rights in the State of California.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the record owner or owners of the land described in this Act in San Bernardino County, California, all right, title, and interest of the United States in the mineral deposits in the land.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain rights in the State of California.
